
# Intro to the CDO

```{r echo=FALSE, fig.cap="", fig.align='center', out.width = '70%'}
knitr::include_graphics("CDO.png")
```

Ross Career Development Office (CDO) Serves all students enrolled in the Ross School of Business. For MBAn in summer, CDO offers sessions for students to learn different career skills such as interview and job research. Some of the sessions are tied to assignments for a business course. Moreover, CDO offers both in-person appointments and virtual appointments with specific career coach for MBAn to ask any career related questions.
